descriptionHTML:
The app contains all character scenes from famous Homeric Epic Odyssey.
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0.



Features on one face:
✔ 3D Parallax effect
✔ Time and date
✔ Color picker for time and date
✔ 10 unique character scenes
✔ Display in dimmed mode
✔ 24/12 hour format


Support all models:
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus Zen Watch
✔ LG G watch
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3


Weather support:
http://openweathermap.org/


How to launch:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press the watch screen and select HomericEpic from the watch face picker
3. You might need to wait a second before the app is synced for both phone and watch.
